file.name: deepobject-array-with-pattern.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: deepobject-array-with-pattern-test
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /test:
    get:
      operationId: test
      parameters:
        - name: options
          in: query
          required: false
          style: deepObject
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Options'
          explode: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
components:
  schemas:
    Options:
      type: object
      properties:
        a:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            pattern: '^[A-Z].*'

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/test": get: parameters: fail: "options": field "A": nested arrays not allowed
